mapper.select: select * from tbl_order_product p join tbl_product_info i on p.p_ino = i.p_ino where l_lno = #{l_lno} order by o_pno
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_product (o_pno, l_lno, p_ino, p_bno, o_amount, o_sum, o_titlepic, o_price, o_deliverycharge) values (#{o_pno}, #{l_lno}, #{p_ino}, #{p_bno}, #{o_amount}, #{o_sum}, #{o_titlepic}, #{o_price}, #{o_deliverycharge})
